alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 12:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dougherty, northwestern Baker, southern Calhoun and northern Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 145 PM EDT... At 1258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arlington, or 13 miles north of Colquitt, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blakely, Arlington, Leary, Douglasville, Damascus, Iveys Mill, Milford, Parksville, Crestview, Colomokee, Hawkinstown, Commissary Hill, Turman, Ferrell Crossroads, Early Co A/p, Old Damascus, Elmodel Wma, Bethany, Kolomoki Mounds Sp and Patmos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
